general.about:
I like to build things with a keen customer focus.

Currently exploring AI products, particularly AI voice agents and conversational AI.

sideProjects.heading: Interview Genie
sideProjects.description:
A conversational agent that runs mock interviews to help users prepare for job interviews. 

Tech: Next.js Postgres, Tailwind
sideProjects.title: Interview Genie

sideProjects.heading: OpenSaas Finder
sideProjects.description: A website for finding Open source alternatives to popular saas products.
sideProjects.title: OpenSaas Finder

sideProjects.heading: StudyWiz
sideProjects.description: As part of AssemblyAI's hackathon I built StudyWiz a website that generates custom questions based on student's painpoints.
sideProjects.title: StudyWiz

workExperience.heading: Site Reliability Engineer at Fly.io
workExperience.description:
Responsibilities:

Joined as the 3rd member of the Ops team to improve the reliability of the platform.

Participated in Linux volume migrations to improve storage reliability of customer apps without any data loss.

Led and established support , worked with developer to debug their deployment failures on our platform

Took part in out of hours on-call
workExperience.title: Site Reliability Engineer

workExperience.heading: DevOps Engineer at Automation Logic
workExperience.description:
Responsibilities:

Led the implementation of an automated system of sending weekly reports to the business stakeholders

Supported customer facing digital applications

Participated in weekend and out of hours on-call 

Wrote Jenkins pipelines to automate SSL certificate deployments and eliminated manual work by around 70%
workExperience.title: DevOps Engineer

volunteering.heading: Mentor at Black Girls in Tech
volunteering.description:
Mentored a recent graduate looking into switching into a DevOps role and she managed to successfully get her first job after working together. 

We held bi-weekly sessions where we looked at her CV, Linkedin and worked on general job application skills together.
volunteering.title: Mentor

education.heading: Bachelor's degree, Neuroscience at University of Leicester

items.heading: Freelance Frontend Developer at The Upsetters
items.description:
Built the frontend for the demo for an [apothecary community](https://www.theupsetters.co.uk/the-apothecary-network) focused mobile app - built using plain javascript, css and html.

Site hosted on a solar-powered Raspberry-pi machine.
items.title: Freelance Frontend Developer

items.heading: Curriculum Developer at Xuntos
items.description: Created and taught content as part of the very first Xuntos technical bootcamp on CI/CD: Jenkins and Gitlab Actions
items.title: Curriculum Developer
